attributes.action: Hillingdon council to open up closed shops for the homless over winter
attributes.additional_details:
They have done this in Manchester and other areas for the winter 
And Hillingdon council should also do the same 
It's freezing cold and these people have no where to go 
Shelters are full 
We are asking you to find a empty shop / building 
That the homeless can sleep in at night 
To keep them warm and safe 
With help from the services to help them get back on there feet 
Over the winter many are going to suffer 
So we want to see a empty building being used to help the homeless
Over the winter months 
And with help for them from the local services to get into permanent 
Homes
attributes.background:
There are lots of homeless people in and around hillingdon borough 
We are asking the  local council  and mps to locate a empty shop / building 
So the homeless have some where  safe and warm to go at night 
During the winter

rejection.details:
This petition asks Hillingdon Council, not the UK Government or Parliament, to take action.

Hillingdon Council has its own petitions system. You can find out more here:

http://www.hillingdon.gov.uk/petitions

You could also raise this issue with local councillors. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
